values:
Hello folks,

Havent had much time to update my journal lately, been busy doing important stuff like working : ) hehe.

Lifes been...good!  Still living with Topher, have been for 3 months now!  Hes great and we get on so well, still havent argued although there have been a few dodgy moments.  Still working at the Registers, same old same old.  Was out in Glasgow at the weekend, was a good laugh, was a bit wasted, not as much as Topher.

Lets see, Chaz is coming up this weekend, ive not seen her since Christmas!  Going to Ayr cattle show, very exciting!  Theres a beer tent, that explains why im going!  Possibly having a barbeque.

Topher is taking me on holiday for my birthday!  yey!  Booking at last minute to get a good deal. 

Joined the gym, my physio said i should loose 2 stone and go at least 3 times a week, im quite enjoying it...missing the cakes.

Better go and do some work

Mwah!

Hey folks,

Sorry about the lack of updates, been really busy and havent had much to say that isnt sad or boring. 

Im okay, starting to get on with my life.  Been thinking alot about the future and what i want to do etc, taking stock some might say.  Im really happy with Topher, we get along so well and still havent had a fight or argument!  I know its only been almost 10 months but we've been through a lot together so having not had an argument is pretty good. 

Some people are starting to really annoy me, one minute they are your friend the next they snap at you for no reason and you cant understand it, shouldnt bring your problems into the workplace and take them out on others.  Im talking to Kerry again, being apprehensive as i dont want to get hurt again.

I really want to go on holiday, i need to just get away for a week or even just a few days.  Might go away next month with Vicky to london, depending on the finances of course! 

Better get on with some work now, but will update again soon if something cool happens. 

PS.  If you like horror films go and see Amityville....its scary to the point where people ran out of the cinema screaming and i sat with Tophers jacket hiding my eyes most of the time.  A sucessful horror film!  x

Well peeps, just when i thought my life was back to normal almost one of the worst things ever happened last monday, my Granda died.  I just couldnt believe it!  He was really fit and healthy until September last year and i knew he was having a few problems recently but wasnt expecting this.  I joked not too long ago that he would out live all of us just to be stubbourn, but now i wish i was right.  We had a humanist funeral on friday at the crematorium then went to a hotel for tea and cakes, which turned in to wine drinking and cakes for me and most other people.  Being half cut at 12pm was strange but it calmed me down.  

Im a bit lost at the moment, first my dog dying now this, its like a big part of me is missing.  Was considering using my inheritance to get away for a few days and clear my head, maybe next month. 

Its strange, i didnt realise i mothered my doggie so much, now im feeling all maternal, might go and get a bunny rabbit, ive always wanted one but i dont know if i should get a pet so soon after suzi. 

Well, hopefully i will have some happier entries in future, will see how things go. x

Hey peeps,

The life of Jen is slowly getting back to normal.  Thats me been back at work for a week and settling in well.  Topher and my parents are back from their holidays, which is great cos i have some company at home etc.  Also quite skint, which is normal for me.  Still upset about Suzi but im keeping my chin up.  My mum said my Granda wasnt well at all yesterday so he's getting the doctor out today, fingers-crossed its nothing serious!

Had a nice weekend.  Saturday Topher and i went to Kilmarnock for lunch, then went a walk in the park.  Afterwards we went to visit his parents and to see the sheep (its almost lambing season).  Then we got a take-away, got ready and went bowling with my friends Alana and Tony in Salcoats.  Was a bit tipsy.  Yesterday didnt get up til 12ish, sat around in our PJ's watching movies and eating sweets etc.  So i seen bambi for the first time, thumpers so cute!  And the baby thumpers! 

Best get on and eat my lunch, im at my desk at work.  Got 4 hours to go so its not too bad. xxx

Well folks, sorry its taken me so long to update, things havent been so great...

On Wednesday i was woken up by my wee dog howling in pain, ran down the stairs and she had tried to walk but collapsed.  She still wouldnt eat or drink and was getting alot worse so we had no choice but to take her to the vet.  Topher took my brother and i to the vet and i was in pieces, cuddling my suzi in her wee blanket, was inconsolable.  The vet said that he could operate to try and un-block her bowel and that may help her but if all didnt go well he would have to put her down.  We were willing to try anything.  Said goodbye and left.  We were to phone at 4.30...2 1/2 hours later.  So i went to Irvine with Topher and Alan went home.  I was worried sick the whole time but Topher managed to cheer me up a bit.  Then i phoned the vet and he told me he had found a tumour blocking her bowels and that he had to put her down.  So she had cancer and according to the vet she had ahd it for a long time.  I was to go and pay the vet and get her blanket when i got home.  Went and seen my brother, he was a wreck, mum and dad had phoned and he told them.  I went up to pay the vet and i got her blanket back...thats when it really sunk in.  I cried my heart out all the way home and even Topher was crying.  I know it was the best for her and im glad she isnt in pain anymore.  I just feel like ive lost a limb, she was family, not just a dog to me and i will miss her so much.  Some people dont realise just home much a pet can mean to you.  She was 14 so i had had her since i was 7 years old, my brother cant remember not having her. 

Topher went to Prague on Thursday morning at 3am, comes home today.  Ive really missed him and im so happy he is home.  Mum and dad come back tomorrow from Las Vegas so im gonna be at home when they get in to give them their anniversary gifts and mothers day present for my mum.

Will update again soon x

What a day!

I awoke to a text message from my brother to say that my doggie was really unwell and asked if id go home asap.  Mum and Dad went to Las Vegas today, and alan had to go to work so she was home alone.  I quickly got ready and came straight home, thinking the worst.  I got in and she was staggering around, so i picked her up, sat down and cried my heart out.  Took her outside and she staggered around a bit, was struggling to do the toilet.  Brought her in and she went to her bed.  After that she deteriorated.  Her back legs were weak, then she couldnt move them, or herself, wouldnt eat anything even her favourite dairy milk chocolate.  Alan came home from work and we took her to the vets, had resigned ourselves to the fact that she might not see the end of the day, which was very hard for us.  The vet said that she has a very bad bowel infection and was dehydrated along with having bronchitus due to her old age.  So she got a few jags, some pills and soluable stuff for her water to hydrate her.  If she doesnt improve by wednesday or thursday we have to take her back to be put down.  Im so gutted, never loved anything as much as i love her and i dont want to loose her.  She is making some progress, has had a wee wander around with assistance so fingers crossed she will pull through.  Mum and Dad know she was ill but dont know she is still alive cos they havent phoned me yet. 

Staying at mum and dads tonight to keep an eye on her.  Ive cried that much i have black bags under my eyes and they are swollen, i look awful.

Will keep you posted. x

Good afternoon,

My apologies about the lack of entries, i only have access to the internet at my parents house.

Lifes going pretty well, apart from certain things.  Had a lovely Valentines Day!  Got a bouquet of long stem roses, 11 white one red (i love white roses), they are so beautiful!  We had a nice breakfast, walked along the beach, visited our parents then went for a nice meal at an indian in Kilwinning.  Was amazing, best Valentines day ever! 

Im getting pretty down about not being able to do much, i feel like a puppy when Topher leaves to go to work and get all sad (i dont bark or anything : )  ) and feel like im nesting, always trying to tidy up and have everything nice for him coming home.  Not sure whats going on with me!  My on and off friend Kez has decided to start talking to me again, not so sure im keen anymore but lifes too short, nothing wrong with being civil. 

My brother is being a pain in the ass, really needs to sort himself out!  Hes gonna ruin his life and everyone elses if he keeps going the way hes going.  Hes upsetting everyone.

Im worried about Jade, shes had a wee operation and i cant seem to get hold of her to see if shes ok.  Will try and phone her again later. 

Having an ann summers party next month, should be a good laugh!  Had one before and it was great!  Just need to make sure people come along!

Better get on....

Topher phoned me tonight, he asked if i wanted to move in on Saturday....tomorrow, cos the trailor he was gonna get from his mum and dad is clean and dry etc now so we could use it!  Im really excited!  Dont think my parents will be over the moon at the sudden move but hope they will understand. 

Fraser moved into a cottage on Kerrys parents farm, Topher helped him.   Kerrys still not bothered to contact me....shouldnt be bothered, its her loss.  They are all going to a girl called Lauras 21st tonight, but im not invited, she hates my guts, has done for a while cos her then boyfriend found out she had cheated on him twice and i got the blame for telling him.  We used to be great friends until then.

Going to meet Vicky today and shes coming to sunny ayrshire for a night in with me, should be good.  xxx

Was very very sore yesterday, dont think the pills are helping me much.  Had a few drinks last night and i felt better.  Woke up this morning and felt as if someone had repeated hit my back with a baseball bat!  Wish that was an exaggeration!  After getting up and wandering downstairs i felt slightly better, think a long hot bath will help.

Apart from that life is looking good!  Got my own keys for Tophers house yesterday, we had a wee chat about me moving in and i told him i was worried about it and was obsessing a bit.  Way he sees it i can do whatever i like and if i want to decorate he's quite happy, which is a great thing cos i get a bit aggitated when things dont look right.  I really need to get a grip, i mean, its not my house and i havent moved in.  I told Alana last night and she was quite happy for me, and Charlenne said that she thinks its a great idea!  Now ive just to tell kerry, not seen her to tell her, and i cant text cos i have no credit in my mobile. I dont think she will be as pleased as the others, i dont care cos its my life and she should want me to be happy.  Dont think hes told Fraser yet....that will be funny.

I am going over to Tophers tonight, getting a take-away (my last for a long time) and chilling out i think.  Might see if he fancies going for a pint or 2.  Im not sure whats happening tomorrow but will see how i feel, bit short of cash at the moment.

Well, just back from seeing the Doctor, she wasnt too pleased that i went back to work when i wasnt ready but was very nice about it all.  She gave me a prescription for painkillers and a sick line for 3 weeks.  So i have to go and see her again in 3 weeks time.  Its a relief that i wont be putting myself through all that pain everyday, but saddens me that i might not see my girls for a few weeks.  At least i got to sit my test for promotion and had my PDS while i was back in. 

Have been thinking a lot over the past few days, about loads of things.  Im really happy at the moment (apart from the sore back), a lot of positive things have happened to me in the past year like getting my job, getting together with chris and now possibly moving in with him.  I think living with Chris will be good and im sure we will have a lot of fun together, im just worried that he will regret asking me.  I dont think i am difficult to live with, although me being a domestic goddess and a perfectionist may get on his nerves.  Also my desire to decorate and buy new wonderful things for the house might get on his wick too.  But thats just me!  I havent told my friends at home yet, wrote a letter to Charlenne and told her but also said not to tell a soul, a specific friend will most definately have something negative to say and im sure she will make her feelings quite clear!  Will tell Alana tomorrow night though.  Maybe i just worry too much. 

Anyway, just gonna have a lazy day today, going to Tophers tonight as hes cooking me a nice meal, im looking forward to it.  x

Id like to start by saying 'Oh MyGod!'  And 'am i dreaming!'. 

Ive been worrying myself silly recently about my love life being under pressure in the coming months.  This was due to Tophers brother Fraser (the fuckwit) planning on moving in with him thus putting us and me in an awkard situation that i dont think i could have handled cos i stay there a few nights a week.  Well, i tried to talk to Topher this evening, just couldnt get the words out.  I asked him when Fraser was moving in and he said he wasnt cos he was gonna ask me to move in....if i hadnt been lying down i would have fell over!  Wasnt expecting it but was a pleasent surprise!  We agreed that we should have a trial run for a week to see how things go and if we get along i will move in sometime after mum and dad get home from Las Vegas (March).  Im so hyper that i cant sleep, hence the late entry when i have to be up at 5.30 for work!  Told mum, havent told Dad yet, will be hard but i have to do it soon.  I will miss my baby (Suzi the Shih Tzu), shes so cute and fluffy.  Maybe its best not to tell alot of people i know incase it all goes tits up, i doubt it will but i dont want to tempt fate. 

Better go and try to sleep, so excited though!  xxx

Ho ho hello,

Its almost Christmas, got a feeling that this Christmas is going to be the best i have had for a long time!  Spent a small fortune on presents, but im happy about it. 

Im loaded with the cold, have been all weekend, its snot fair!  hehe.  Backs been quite sore and ice is starting to freak me out but apart from that im fine!  Went and met Jade on Friday for lunch, nobody else could make it, shes a wee gem!  Then went shopping and got some clothes.  Survived James' 30th birthday dinner at my boyfriends parents house that night, was quite good, didnt talk or look at Fraser really, was quite hard but i think i'll get used to it!  Had a nice weekend, went to Ayr shopping, got a few things, went for a chinese take-away and had a night in with Topher, although, he wasnt feeling too well after the take-away, feel bad cos i went on and on about this chinese being amazing etc.  Then yesterday my sister and her boyfriend came to visit us from essex, was great to see them!  Will see them in less than two weeks when me and Topher go down but i hadn't seen dan for a year and a half and hadnt seen Joanna since my 21st in June so it was nice.  Then Topher and i went to see A Series Of Unfortunate Events, was amazing!  Back started getting sore towards the end tho. 

Im quite happy, realised a few things this weekend.  Im really happy with my relationship with Topher, we get along so well and ive never met anyone like him, im still holding back slightly, for good reason though, dont want to scare him off amongst other things.  Almost 6 months now, time flys by when you are having fun!  I dont know if he thinks things are moving too fast or too slow or what, but i think that conversation should not be had at this moment, could ruin things.  Im also happy with life at home at the moment, maybe people are being nice cos Christmas is coming up, but im liking it.  And ive decided theres no point in worrying about friends too, as long as im sure im making the effort and being a good friend how they feel is up to them. 

Going to see the Borrowers play on the 30th of December with Topher and his neice and nephew, should be good fun!  I cant wait, love pantomimes!  I know they may not know what the borrowers are but i loved the programme when i was younger, think Topher liked it too.

Take care, will try to update before christmas.

Mwah x

Hello folks,

Been meaning to update my journal for a few days, just been busy. 

Oh the weekend...Valerie and William came to visit me on saturday afternoon, friends from work.  Was good to see them, been missing everyone!  They brought my freeview box, i won it in the works christmas raffle, how lucky is that!  Its good, but as we live in a Valley its not picking up all the channels that it should.  Then Topher came over and we went out for dinner, got tipsy, went for a look around tesco then went to his house.  On Sunday we went to his parents house then went to Irvine shopping. 

Put the Christmas tree up on Monday night, was good fun!  Wrapped up some Christmas presents too.

Someone who i thought was my friend really upset me yesterday.  My 'friend' Fraser had told my pal that me and him werent getting on too well, news to me.  So rather than just leaving it like i should have, i text him to say if there was any hard feelings we should sort them out cos i didnt want to loose him as a friend and was sorry if id been a cow etc.  He text me back 2 hours later saying 'Its simple Jen ive tried 2 get on wi u 4 years but i just dont like u! a wil be socialable wi u cos your goin wi ma bro.but pals no.'  Can i just say...what a cunt!  And he cant even spell!  Thats the worst thing anyones ever said to me!  I hadnt done anything wrong, but i apologised incase i had...extended an olive branch, and get that shit in return.  So for the past 4 1/2 years, ive stuck up for him, made the effort, and been a good pal to him when he didnt even like me.  Im a fool.   I didnt text back.  He is my boyfriends brother and im going to have to sit and have a meal with his family and him twice in the space of a week.  Will be hard but ive got to do it!  As for being sociable, he doesnt exist to me anymore, if someone can hurt you like that they are not worth knowing, dont you think?  Hope it doesnt make things difficult for Topher, its not fair for him but theres nothing i can do to make it better.

On a happier note....im coming into Glasgow on Friday to meet some friends for work for lunch!  Hooray!  Will get to see my princess!  And give them presents.  And hopefully going to see 'A Series Of Unfortunate Events' at the weekend.

Better go and get ready, going to see Siobhan perform in Stars In Their Eyes in the town hall.

Mwah! x

Good morning,

Its Friday!  And rather than sitting in work, all glammed up having a giggle and getting ready to go on my Christmas lunch with my friends from work, im stuck at home, in my pj's, with my snoring shih tzu for company.  Sucks doesnt it!  I know what id rather be doing!  Cant exactly go out on the piss in busy glasgow with a fractured back can you?  Even my mum, my boyfriend and my best mate are out on their works christmas night outs tonight!  Ive asked Kez to come over for a chinese and a blether tonight, could be good fun! Her night out is tomorrow night.

The doctor lady was very nice yesterday, gave me some good painkillers etc....then produced a sick line for 4 weeks!  EEEKKK!  What am i gonna do?  I miss my work buddies already!  What am i gonna be like after 5 weeks in total, apart from extremely fat????  I know its for my own good and my back has to heal, its just not fair. 

On a happier note, my friend Chaz is coming home for Christmas!  Im going out on Christmas Eve, no matter what, even if it kills me!  Largs Vegas here we come!!!  hehe. 

I may wrap more presents today, depending on whether i can be arsed with the HUGE present i have to wrap.  Could be fun!

Topher was over last night, making me smile as always.  I really dont wanna fuck this up cos i love him and dont want to loose him anytime soon. Watched Christmas With The Kranks, was good!  We both like Christmas films. 

Until next time.....

Good afternoon,

Well, still in a lot of pain.  Not so bad being stuck in the house, people come to see you!  Been keeping myself busy, soaking in bubble baths and playing the sims.  Suzi (my Shih Tzu) is keeping me company, shes quite demanding though.

Looking forward to Christmas, wrapped some presents earlier.  Tree doesnt go up until sunday at the earliest, hopefully i'll be able to help put it up.  Got suzi a wee christmas outfit consisting of a santa hat and wee red fleecy jacket, mum says its cruel and wont let me dress her up, but she will look cute!  And could take photos!

Seeing topher this evening, going out for a pizza hut i think, need to get out for a bit.   Hes been really good about it all.

Found out yesterday that my friend Leanne is getting married in Florida next september, i would like to go but will see how things go.  Its my ex's brother she is marrying but he isnt going.....hooray!

Hello again,

Thought i would grow out of being accident prone and clumsy at 21 but no, not me.  While leaving the house to go to work on Thursday morning i slipped on ice on my back door step and hurt my back.  I still went to work, but as the journey went on my back got more and more painful.  Got into Glasgow and had to buy ibuprofen, took me 20mins to walk a 3 min journey to the office.  Eventually after discovering it was very painful to sit down or walk around, i asked to see a first-aider and was taken to accident and emergency where it was later discovered that i had fractured the base of my back and had bad internal bruising, lovely.  Got nice morphine injection and other anesthetics, pretty out my tree!  Mum came to get me in Glasgow and i came home.  Had to go to fracture clinic yesterday and they told me that i have a few cracks, seen my x-ray, kinda weird, but i was told i wont be back at work til after Christmas, off for 3 weeks!  I'll be bored stupid!   So expect many diary entries!  Hehe.  Tophers been very good, been to visit me twice and bought me jaffa cakes, hes such a darling!  Expecting a wee visit from Kez today.  If im up to it i may show face at my friend sharons 21st party at her house, wont be 'busy' so no danger of getting bashed around.  Although if someone thinks its funny to touch my back they'll get a matching injury! 

Apart from that everythings ok.  Tophers present got delivered on Thursday, and i have most if not all of my christmas shopping done!  So that was lucky eh! 

xxx

Well folks,  I had a fabulous action packed weekend as predicted!  I went to see Bridget Jones on Friday night with Kez and Fraz, was awesome!  On saturday my lovely boyfriend (topher) and i went to the transport police station to look at pictures of possible attackers (long story), spent the day together then he had a party at his house that night which was quite fun, including one of his cousins mates going on about how he pisses in corners of rooms and on unusual objects such as TV's when hes drunk, was hilarious. On sunday we went to his parents farm where i had my first tractor experience, was good fun!  Then had a quiet night in.  

Lets see, im still a happy bunny, ok so im at work and its Monday but i remain happy.  Moving my bedroom around tonight, should be delightful!  I'll probably regret it soon after starting it!  

Bye for now xxx

Oh my god....i cant believe i have had this diary for so long and i haven't written anything!  Well, let me see, what can i write about?  Oh, its Friday!!!!  Yipeee!  Im going to see Bridget Jones tonight hopefully, depending on wether Kerry is well enought to go (she wasnt well yesterday).  Failing that its a wee cosy night in by myself and i may move my bedroom around.....if i can be bothered.  Then will apply the amazing boots no7 and go to bed. 

Let me see, Jizz seems to write about how shes feeling on her journal so i thought id do the same.  Im quite happy these days, got a semi-decent job, a lovely boyfriend and will hopefully be driving around in my own wee car soon!  The lovely boyfriend makes me very happy and we have so much fun when we are together.  Going for promtion in the semi-decent job so thats good if i get it.  Im missing my friend Chaz,she moved away a month ago and it feels like ages!  Also desperate to see my sister as i dont get to see her much cos she lives in essex and i live in the arse end of nowhere in sunny ayrshire! 

Looking forward to my weekend, will no doubt write about it in my next entry....involves a party at the boyfriends house, shopping, visiting Deanne and chilling out.  Possibly go swimming on sunday if im not hungover!

Just keep swimming.....just keep swimming....
